caption.p: List of natural products under clinical trials for COVID-19

tr.th: Classification/Possible mechanism of action for use in COVID-19

tr.td: Potent inhibitor of Nod-like receptor family, pyrin-containing 3 (NLRP3)
Artemisinin, Curcumin, Boswellia, and Vitamin C (ArtemiC)
Anti-oxidant, anti-inflammatory, and anti-aggregant and anti-microbial
Traditional Chinese medicines (various herbal products are included in this category)
Immunomodulatory and anti-inflammatory mechanisms, decrease the level of cytokines such as TNF-α, IL-1β, IL-6, IL-8, and IL-10, inhibit lung inflammation or acute lung injury
